local_intent: Perceive the white_carton, approach and align within 0.02 tolerance, then verify tool yaw is 90 degrees for the planned rightward push.
assumptions: Yaw 90° corresponds to the intended push direction to the right; object remains visible post-approach.
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT: detection with 3 retries, then ApproachAndAlign with tolerance 0.02 and timeout 3000; verifies readiness for the 90° push via AtOrientation.
